All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

Photo: Courtesy of Abercrombie and Fitch.

If the new year has you craving a fresh start (and wanting to spend your holiday money) to your wardrobe, check out Abercrombie & Fitch’s Tryout Event. The brand’s current sale offers 30% off all of its YPB (Your Personal Best) active styles and 20% off almost everything else on the site.

If you’re ready to get back into the gym or Pilates studio, start up your hot girl walks or marathon training, or step onto the tennis court, Abercrombie & Fitch has all your activewear wardrobe needs covered. The YPB styles on sale include a range of leggings and sweatpants, as well as workout tanks and hoodies. And if you’re looking to refresh your entire wardrobe, the brand has deals on its bestselling jeans, winter jackets, wedding guest dresses, and much more. 

What’s more, you can stack an extra 15% off your already-discounted purchase with code AFYBF at checkout from now through January 6. So get to shopping and take on the new year in style. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Abercrombie & Fitch Hoodies & Sweatpants

Whether you’re looking for matching sweatsuit sets to lounge around in or break a sweat in this winter and beyond, there are many cozy separates to peruse, from full-zip hoodies and wide-leg sweatpants to trendy polo sweatshirts and slinky joggers. The only hard thing will be deciding which colorways to cart up, and whether you want a bold monochromatic look or a casual mismatched ‘fit in 2025.

Abercrombie & Fitch Leggings

If you love slipping into leggings for your walks and yoga classes, check out Abercrombie & Fitch’s activewear styles. Shop pieces in bestselling fabrics like the smooth and supportive SculptLUX in 7/8-long and flared styles. You can also find a new lightweight and non-restrictive StudioFLEX fabric in several legging silhouettes. Each YPB style is additionally available in Curve Love sizes.

Abercrombie & Fitch Tanks & Sports Bras

Effortlessly match your workout top to your leggings with tons of fitted tanks and camis that are available in the same colorways and SculptLUX and StudioFLEX materials. Each of these tops features built-in bras for extra support while you exercise, but you can also pick up an adorable sweetheart-neckline sports bra to layer underneath, too. 

Abercrombie & Fitch Dresses & Shorts

Yes, tenniscore will continue to be big in 2025. So whether you avidly play the sport or are eager to try it for the first time, step on the court in a workout dress that’ll put you in the right mindset. (They include built-in shorts for extra coverage and comfort so you don’t have to worry about anything other than your game.) Abercrombie also has new biker and running shorts if dresses aren’t your activewear of choice.
